inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Men and women with mild to moderate PD: Hoehn and Yahr scale stages 1 - 3
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with advanced, severe disease, including those with dementia, severe osteoarthritis, allergies, stroke, and visual impairment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of atypical PD syndromes due to drugs (e.g., metoclopramide, flunarizine), metabolic identified neurogenetic disorders (e.g., Wilson's disease), encephalitis, or other degenerative diseases (e.g., progressive supranuclear palsy).
exclusion.label: not_met
